mean_cn: n. 麻醉剂，麻药；  adj. 麻醉的，感觉缺失的
mean_en: a drug that causes a person to lose feeling and to feel no pain in part or all of the body
word_etyma: an无 + esthes知觉 + ic名词后缀 → anesthetic 麻醉剂
sentence: The doctor gave an anesthetic before surgery so that the patient would not feel pain.
sentence_trans: 医生在手术前（为病人）注射了一针麻醉剂，所以病人不会感觉到疼痛。
